name: Overgrowth (itch) (Whullum, Hi_Jr, Lorenzo Torres, MagicDoogies, tamarub)
name_original: Overgrowth (itch) (Whullum, Hi_Jr, Lorenzo Torres, MagicDoogies, tamarub)
description:
A procedurally generated dungeon crawler about cute animals and a cursed tree.

-----

How to play:

Enter a procedurally generated dungeon and find the exit

Outrun the Overgrowth before it catches up to you

Slay corrupted enemies and collect seeds to buy upgrades

Rescue NPCs to unlock new shops, weapons, and abilities

-----

Controls:

WASD to move

Left mouse click to attack

Shift to sprint

Space to dodge (once unlocked)

Q to use reflect ability (once unlocked)

1 equip Sword (once unlocked)

2 equip Bow (once unlocked)

-----

A submision for Global Game Jam 2023 - https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/overgrowth-6
